text: Helloo, not sure where to post this. but I just need some simple advice, i got some stains on my pillowcase / quilt cover since yesterday, this morning i intend to soak it, could i actually soak the quilt cover and pillow cases together with regular washing powder in a pail ? Or is there a proper way to soak a quilt cover ? I'm afraid it might harm the quality and material of the quilt cover / pillow case. I would appreciate advice and answers from those who knows.
Why dun send for dry cleaning if u worry
yes, you actually could soak it with normal detergent. Just dont soak it overnight, 2-3 hours will do.
